it.uniba.sotorrent

Class SOQuery

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.uniba.sotorrent.SOQuery
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISOQuery

    public final class SOQuery
extends java.lang.Object
implements ISOQuery
    SOQuery.java ||Boundary|| This class contains Node and Edge queries, required to get the results from google Big Query service. Each method returns a Job, from which we can extract the result by the column labels, using getter methods included in the class.
    Author:
    bernerslee1819

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SOQuery()
      Default constructor, instantiates BigQuery API service.

      Returns the results from the query job (Edge).

      Returns the results from the query job (Node).

      Returns the results from the query job.
      com.google.cloud.bigquery.Job runEdgeAnswer(int userId, int limit)
      View the list of the first 100 couples (from, to) related to answers (Answer) written by a specific user.
      com.google.cloud.bigquery.Job runEdgeAnswerWeight(int userId, int limit)
      View the list of the first 100 triples (from, to, weight) related to answers (Answer) written by a specific user.
      com.google.cloud.bigquery.Job runEdgeQuestion(int userId, int limit)
      //Chrism1c View the list of the first 100 couples (from, to) related to questions (Question) asked by a specific user.
      com.google.cloud.bigquery.Job runEdgeQuestionDate(int year, int month, int day, int limit)
      //prrid, RuggieroPedico View the list of the first 100 couples (from, to) related to questions (Question) asked in a specific date, ordered cresc.
      com.google.cloud.bigquery.Job runEdgeQuestionDateWeight(int year, int month, int day, int limit)
      View the list of the first 100 triples (from, to, weight) related to questions (Question) asked in a specific date, ordered cresc.
      com.google.cloud.bigquery.Job runEdgeQuestionWeight(int user, int limit)
      View the list of the first 100 triples (from, to, weight) related to questions (Question) asked by a specific user.
      com.google.cloud.bigquery.Job runNodeAnswerDate(int year, int month, int day, int limit)
      //mircocrit finds out the first 100 users who answered a question in a specific date, in asc. order.
      com.google.cloud.bigquery.Job runNodeAnswerTag(int year, int month, java.lang.String tag, int limit)
      finds out the first 100 users (User) which has made an answer (Answer) in a specific date using an argument (Tag), ordered cresc.
      com.google.cloud.bigquery.Job runNodePostDate(int year, int month, int day, int limit)
      //mpia3 finds out the first 100 users who has made a post(answers or questions) in a specific date, in asc. order.
      com.google.cloud.bigquery.Job runNodePostTag(int year, int month, java.lang.String tag, int limit)
      finds out the first 100 users (User) which has made a post (a post could be a question or an answer) in a specific date using an argument (Tag), ordered cresc.
      com.google.cloud.bigquery.Job runNodeQuestionDate(int year, int month, int day, int limit)
      //Faiail finds out the first 100 users which has made a question in a specific date, ordered cresc.
      com.google.cloud.bigquery.Job runNodeQuestionTag(int year, int month, java.lang.String tag, int limit)
      //Chrismic finds out the first 100 users (User) which has made a question (Question) in a specific date using an argument (Tag), ordered cresc.

      Starts the query.
